paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses several variants in the BRCA2 gene, their functional implications, and penetrance data related to affected and unaffected carriers.

functional_data.summary: Impaired specifically the dsDNA binding activity of BRCA2 and cannot promote RAD51-mediated recombination.

variants.additional_notes: The variant shows hypersensitivity to replication stress induced by hydroxyurea.
key_quotes: ssDNA gaps form in cells expressing BRCA2-C315S despite a functional fork arrest and persist through mitosis.

functional_data.summary: Impaired both ssDNA and dsDNA binding in vitro.

variants.additional_notes: The variant shows hypersensitivity to replication stress induced by hydroxyurea.
key_quotes: BRCA2 NTD variants S273L and C315S displayed similar sensitivity to HU as the BRCA2-deficient cells.

functional_data.summary: Affects the ssDNA binding activity of the CTD and is therefore deficient in HR.

variants.additional_notes: The variant shows hypersensitivity to PARP inhibitors.
key_quotes: R3052W, the CTD variant that impairs HR activity, showed hypersensitivity to the treatment.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted from the main text.
